name: 2 Tubas - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 2 Tubas ensemble. Deep, resonant bass providing orchestral brass foundation. Massive low-end power for cinematic impact and orchestral depth.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with sustained - add an articulation change entry, switching to staccatissimo - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained, then back to staccatissimo. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble tubas (2 players). CC1 controls dynamics for sustained. No legato available. Use velocity for staccatissimo.
